results.content:
Not every step is well explained, some videos have problems and are frozen while the audio is still playing.

The course doesn't have resources as a repository where to get the db schema or fonts.
results.content_html:
Not every step is well explained, some videos have problems and are frozen while the audio is still playing.

results.content: Very broad and basic overview of the different stacks involved. Not much detail on putting it all together for a fully "complete" server-side app. It leaves a lot up to the user to do further research. The latter half of this course seems very rushed and not much thought into providing solid and thorough understanding for the "student".
